caption.p: The effect of volatile oil of C. phaeocaulis and its vinegar-processed products on zebrafish heart morphology. (A) Blank control group. (B) Volatile oil of C. phaeocaulis (20 µg/mL). (C) Volatile oil of C. phaeocaulis (50 µg/mL). (D) Blank control group. (E) Volatile oil of C. phaeocaulis vinegar-processed products (20 µg/mL). (F) Volatile oil of C. phaeocaulis vinegar-processed products (50 µg/mL).
